Major_Arcs.title: The Dinosaur Dealership Saga
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc encompasses the narrative threads related to dinosaur trading, sales, and the experiences of characters at and around Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership.

sub_scenes.title: Contemplating a New Dinosaur
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the idea of trading in an old dinosaur and transitions to the setting of Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership.

narrative_arcs.title: Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership and Shopping

sub_scenes.title: The Zippy Dinosaur Test Ride and Sale
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on a customer's test ride of a 'zippy' dinosaur, the unexpected pinch, and the subsequent purchase decision.

narrative_arcs.title: The Zippy Dinosaur's Test Ride and Pinch
Concluding the Dinosaur Deal After Test Ride

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Farewell and Resale
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the emotional farewell to Dinny and his subsequent appearance for resale at the dealership.

narrative_arcs.title: Dinny on Sale at the Dinosaur Dealership

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Unmasking During Another Sale Attempt
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts another sales attempt at the dealership involving a bumpy test ride and the dramatic reveal that the dinosaur is Dinny.

narrative_arcs.title: Dinosaur Sales Pitch and Unpleasant Test Ride

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Return and Uncontrolled Behavior
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Dinny's reappearance, his defense, and his subsequent uncontrolled and chaotic return.

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Misunderstandings and Fishing Trip Antics
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the romantic relationships and interpersonal conflicts among the characters, particularly focusing on Alley, Coola, and Koko, intertwined with humorous fishing trip scenarios.

sub_scenes.title: Alley and Coola's Breakup
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the interaction between Alley and Coola, starting with a fishing invitation and escalating to a dramatic breakup.

sub_scenes.title: Misogynistic Musings and Fishing Trip Annoyances
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene presents general misogynistic thoughts and specific annoyances during a fishing trip, leading to confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: Fishing Trip Annoyances: Baiting and Loud Talking
Confrontation and Apology on the Fishing Trip

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Gossip and Misdirection with Cherie
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves gossip about Coola's faithfulness and a journey to verify rumors, leading to a scene focused on Cherie instead.

narrative_arcs.title: Gossip and Competition for Coola's Affections
Skepticism and the Challenge to Verify Coola's Loyalty

sub_scenes.title: Jealous Confrontation and Romantic Reversal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features a jealous confrontation, misdirected aggression, and a surprising romantic outcome involving Koko.

narrative_arcs.title: Misdirected Aggression and a Name Revealed
Affectionate Comfort and a Confused Realization

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Advice and Unconventional Techniques
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on romantic advice given to a heartbroken caveman, including defining romance and suggesting an unusual technique.

sub_scenes.title: Escalating Romantic Rivalry and Misunderstandings
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts various romantic interactions, escalating jealousy, and misunderstandings leading to further conflicts.

narrative_arcs.title: Critique of Vulgarity and Subdued Crocodile
Alley's Romantic Resolution and New Approach

Major_Arcs.title: The Twitch Dance Craze and its Consequences
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around the introduction of the 'Twitch' dance, its social impact, and the unexpected injuries resulting from it.

sub_scenes.title: The Dangers of the New Twist Dance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the immediate physical consequences of performing the 'New Twist' dance.

narrative_arcs.title: Consequences of the New Twist Dance

sub_scenes.title: Social Pressure to Participate in the Twitch
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene highlights the social pressure to participate in the 'twitch' dance, particularly for Alley.

narrative_arcs.title: Pressure to Participate in the Twitch Dance

sub_scenes.title: Dance Lessons and Identity Reveal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Alley's reluctant dance lessons, comedic mishaps during practice, and culminates in a surprising identity reveal.

sub_scenes.title: Public Humiliation and Hospitalization from Twitch
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the escalating social and physical consequences of the 'twitch' dance, including public humiliation and widespread injuries leading to hospitalization.

narrative_arcs.title: Nighttime Twitch Discussion and Mysterious Fear

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel to 16th Century Spain for Research
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the time travel journey of Alley (Oop) to 16th century Spain to gather research information, encountering various Spanish scenarios and misunderstandings.

sub_scenes.title: The Time Machine Plan and Romantic Interlude
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the plan to use a time machine to send Oop to Spain, interspersed with a romantic scene between Alley and Ooola.

narrative_arcs.title: Researching 16th Century Spain and the Time Machine Idea
Preparing the Time Machine for Oop
Romantic Moonlight Scene with Alley and Ooola
Arguing and Agreeing to a Kiss
Time Machine Activation and Unexpected Transportation
Welcome to the 20th Century and the Spanish Assignment
Frustration over Interrupted Kiss and Justification for Time Travel
Postponed Kiss and Dispatch to Ancient Spain

sub_scenes.title: Spanish Misunderstandings and Serenade Intervention
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Alley's arrival in Spain, his immediate confrontation, and his intervention in a serenade, leading to further misunderstandings.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in Spain and Initial Confusion
The Serenade and the Annoyed Observer
Attack on the Serenader and Balcony Woman's Initial Reaction
Apology, Impending Consequences, and the Manager's Arrival

sub_scenes.title: The Bullfight and its Swift Conclusion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the events leading up to and including the bullfight, culminating in Alley's swift victory.

narrative_arcs.title: Urgency to Start the Bullfight and Crowd's Demand
Spectator Commentary on Bullfighter's Appearance and Weapon Choice
Doubt and Reassurance about the Bullfighter's Courage

Major_Arcs.title: Oop's Return, Abduction, and Kiss Denial
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the events surrounding Oop's return to the present, his unexpected abduction, and his surprising denial of a promised kiss.

sub_scenes.title: Decision to Retrieve Oop and Spanish Courting
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up Oop's return and includes a brief, unrelated scene of Spanish courting.

narrative_arcs.title: Decision to Retrieve Oop for Information
Courting Scene with Spanish Lady and Gentleman

sub_scenes.title: Oop's Abduction and the Promised Kiss
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Oop's return in a captured state, Jane's reaction, and the reminder of a promised kiss.

narrative_arcs.title: Oop's Abduction and Jane's Relief at His Return
Jane Reminds Oop of Promised Kiss
Oop's Unexpected Denial of Kiss and Revelation

Major_Arcs.title: The King for a Day and Temporary Rulership
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the humorous and chaotic events surrounding the concept of 'King for a Day' and the challenges of temporary rulership.

sub_scenes.title: The Reality of Being King for a Day
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the 'King for a Day' and the initial experiences, revealing the unexpected difficulties.

narrative_arcs.title: King for a Day and the Reality of Throne Life

sub_scenes.title: Temporary Replacement and Hostile Reign
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the original king's departure, the appointment of a temporary replacement, and the crowd's immediate hostile reaction.

narrative_arcs.title: King's Planned Absence and Temporary Replacement
Proclamation and Respect Demand for Temporary King
Reign of Rocks: The Temporary King's Downfall
Aftermath and the Original King's Return

Major_Arcs.title: Guz and Oompa's Domestic Spat and Guz's Realization
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on a domestic conflict between Guz and Oompa, leading to Guz's understanding of the original Guz's need for vacations.

sub_scenes.title: Misunderstood Leisure and Oompa's Ire
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Guz's mistaken enjoyment of ulcer pills and Oompa's angry reaction to his behavior.

narrative_arcs.title: Guz's Misunderstood Leisure and Oompa's Ire

sub_scenes.title: Guz's Tub Contemplation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Guz reflecting on his experience and realizing why the original Guz needs vacations.

narrative_arcs.title: Guz's Tub Contemplation and Vacation Insight

Major_Arcs.title: Royal Justice and the Clam Dispute Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc presents a series of minor conflicts culminating in a clam dispute resolved by a wise elder under the crowned figure's authority.

sub_scenes.title: Minor Conflicts and Royal Observation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces isolated conflicts - a cheating accusation and a money fight - observed by a crowned figure.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusation of Cheating in a Game

sub_scenes.title: The Mystery of the Missing Clams Resolved by the Wise Elder
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the clam dispute, the crowned figure's intervention, and the wise elder's resolution.

narrative_arcs.title: The Mystery of the Missing Clams and Royal Inquiry
Royal Deduction and Wise Elder Intervention in the Clam Dispute
Wise Elder's Resolution: 'Nothing Left to Fight About'

Major_Arcs.title: Palace Intrigue and the Unpleasant Kingship
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts events within 'Moonina Palace', including disturbances, financial impropriety, and the crowned caveman's growing dissatisfaction with being king.

sub_scenes.title: Disturbance and Financial Misconduct in Moonina Palace
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a disturbance in 'Moonina Palace' and reveals financial misconduct by the guard/advisor.

Major_Arcs.title: Post-Kingship and the New Ruler Offer
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the aftermath of the 'King for a Day' scenario, including apologies, the former king's relief, and a new offer of rulership.

sub_scenes.title: Apologies and Freedom from Kingship
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows apologies exchanged and the former king's joy at relinquishing his crown.

sub_scenes.title: Measuring with a Board (Isolated Scene)
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene appears to be a brief, isolated comedic interlude.

narrative_arcs.title: Measuring with a Board and Strange Duck

Major_Arcs.title: The Barberous Act at Moo Tonsorial Parlor
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces and explores the concept of the 'Barberous Act' and its implementation at Moo Tonsorial Parlor.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Revelation of the Barberous Act
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the prophecy and leads to the revelation of what the 'Barberous Act' entails.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Machine Mishap and the Roman Centurion
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the narrative by returning to the time machine plot thread, depicting a malfunction and the unexpected arrival of a Roman Centurion.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Setup and Unexpected Result
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the inventor preparing the time machine to bring Oop, but instead, a Roman Centurion materializes.

Major_Arcs.title: The Clam Debt Trick
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around Guz's elaborate scheme to retrieve a debt of five clams from King Guz using a staged drowning.

sub_scenes.title: Staged Drowning and Debt Recouped
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Guz's feigned drowning, the rescue, and his subsequent confrontation of King Guz about the unpaid debt.

Major_Arcs.title: Bronto Soreness and Age
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Alley Oop's experience riding a clumsy, old dinosaur and discovering the reason for its clumsiness.

sub_scenes.title: Clumsy Dinosaur and Explanation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Alley Oop encountering a dinosaur that keeps bumping into trees and learning that it's due to old age.
